definition: refined cream cheese/fig. crème de la crème/nirvana/Buddha nature/Buddhist truth/broth/flawless personal character
lit. to anoint your head with the purest cream (idiom); fig. to enlighten people with perfect wisdom/flawless Buddhist teaching

sentences.english: It is said the love is blind but friendship is clairvoyant.
sentences.chinese: 据说爱情令人盲目，而友谊却能让人醍醐灌顶。

sentences.english: It is like sarpirmanda, which is pure in its nature.
sentences.chinese: 这就象是醍醐，它的本性是纯洁的。

sentences.english: It is like sarpirmanda, which is the best of all medicines.
sentences.chinese: 它像醍醐，它是所有药之中最好的。

sentences.english: It is said that love id blind but friendship is clairvoyant.
sentences.chinese: 爱情令人盲目，而友情却能醍醐灌顶，据说如此。

sentences.english: It is said that love is blind but friendship is clairvoyant.
sentences.chinese: 爱情令人盲目，而友谊能醍醐灌顶。

sentences.english: Certainly, who can really 'strike that cord' in us, will impact our life in a profound way.
sentences.chinese: 当然，对我们醍醐灌顶的人会深刻地影响我们的生活。

definition: to ladle out/to dip/to pour out
free of worldly concerns/above the fray/at peace with the world
to scoop up water with the hands
Langyuan paradise, home of the immortals in verse and legends
